sen.j: 玄証（げんしょう、久安2年（1146年） － 元久元年（1204年）?）は、平安時代末期から鎌倉時代前期にかけての真言宗の僧。
sen.e: Gensho (1146 ~ 1204?) was a priest of Shingon sect of the end of Heian period to early Kamakura period.

sen.j: 覚鑁の付法弟子である大乗房証印および醍醐寺範果から真言密教を学んだ。
sen.e: He learnt Shingon Esoteric Buddhism from a fuhodeshi (literally, mastered disciple), Daijobosshoin of Kakuban and Hanka of Daigo-ji Temple.

sen.e: In 1193, he prayed for a safe delivery of Gishumon-in, and he was appointed to Dento Daihossi-I.

sen.e: He copied and collected many iconography and sutra regarding esoteric Buddhism, and a number of materials are left at Kozan-ji Temple in Kyoto.
